WorkItem.ClosedComment:
I'm going to close this as a duplicate of 2243

https://typescript.codeplex.com/workitem/2243, since there is no additional information in this bug.
WorkItem.Description:
From: https://typescript.codeplex.com/discussions/535688

I'm not experiencing any freezing across a relatively large codebase in VS 2013.

However, performance in the 1.0RC is down across the board.

This includes both project compilation and intellisense in Visual Studio.

This is a shame because many other outstanding issues appear to have been resolved.
WorkItem.Summary: TypeScript 1.0RC compilation and intellisense noticeably slower
